meanings.definition: Situated or occurring outside a cell or cells.
meanings.sent1: The extracellular environment provides support to the cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the extracellular matrix to understand cell behavior.
meanings.sent3: The extracellular picnic area was a hit with the cell community.
meanings.sent4: The extracellular space felt like a vast ocean surrounding the cells.
meanings.sent5: The extracellular region was teeming with life, much like a bustling city.

meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring in the spaces outside of cells.
meanings.sent1: The extracellular molecules play a crucial role in cell communication.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are researching extracellular signaling for medical advancements.
meanings.sent3: The extracellular parking lot was always full of cell cars.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts wandered in the extracellular realm of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The extracellular realm seemed like a mysterious void waiting to be explored.
